data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 1,510,100 citizens of the the county of Kangra.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kangra, Himachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Kangra words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Kangra that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Kangra, Himachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Rajput Atiras people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, let those from the 16,611 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,475,166, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Kangra, Himachal Pradesh, India today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
